BHI: branch if C flag set and Z flag clear
BLS: branch if C flag clear and Z flag set
BGE: branch if ((N flag set and V flag set) or (N flag clear and V flag clear))
BLT: branch if ((N flag set and V flag clear) or if (N flag clear and V flag set))
BGT: branch if (Z flag clear and ((N flag set or V flag set) or (N flag clear or V flag clear)))
BLE: branch if (Z flag set or ((N flag set and V flag clear) or (N flag clear and V flag set)))
